comment: Lemma 4 for ~ frgrwopreg . In a friendship graph each vertex with degree ` K ` is connected with any vertex with degree other than ` K ` . This corresponds to statement 4 in [Huneke] p. 2: "By the first claim, every vertex in A is adjacent to every vertex in B.". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 10-May-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 4-Feb-2022.)
